\begin{table}[ht]
    \centering
    \begin{tabular}{|l|l|l|l|}
    \hline
                  & \textbf{Impact: High} & \textbf{Impact: Medium} & \textbf{Impact: Low} \\
    \hline
    \textbf{Likelihood: High}    & Critical       & High            & Medium         \\
    \hline
    \textbf{Likelihood: Medium}  & High           & Medium          & Low            \\
    \hline
    \textbf{Likelihood: Low}     & Medium         & Low             & Low            \\
    \hline
    \end{tabular}
\end{table}
